Package dataAccess

Class ProductDAO

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.ProductDAO
public class ProductDAO
extends java.lang.Object
ProductDAO.java - this is a more complex class, created in order to perform all of the operations needed for a Product; Here, the methods are designed using the Connection already established with the SQL database;

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ProductDAO()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void deleteProduct​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String productName)
    This method deletes a Product object, from the Database, using its name;
    Product findProduct​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String name)
    This method finds a Product object, from the Database created, using its name;
    void insertProduct​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String productQuantity, java.lang.String productPrice)
    This method inserts a new Product object in the Database created using a String with all the needed Data;
    void updateProduct​(Product p, java.sql.Connection conn)
    This method updates the Product object after each Order which has been processed, the stock will decrease as soon as the Order is accepted;

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ProductDAO

      public ProductDAO()

  • Method Details

    • insertProduct

      public void insertProduct​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String productName, java.lang.String productQuantity, java.lang.String productPrice)
      This method inserts a new Product object in the Database created using a String with all the needed Data;
      Parameters:
      conn - : A variable representing the Connection with the SQL;
      productName - : A variable of type String. It represents the Name of the new Product;
      productQuantity - : A variable of type String. It represents the Quantity of the new Product;
      productPrice - : A variable of type String. It represents the Price of the new Product;

    • deleteProduct

      public void deleteProduct​(java.sql.Connection conn, java.lang.String productName)
      This method deletes a Product object, from the Database, using its name;
      Parameters:
      conn - : A variable representing the Connection with the SQL;
      productName - : A variable of type String. It represents the Name of the Product which will be deleted;

    • findProduct

      public Product findProduct​(java.sql.Connection con, java.lang.String name)
      This method finds a Product object, from the Database created, using its name;
      Parameters:
      conn - : A variable representing the Connection with the SQL;
      name - : A variable of type String. It represents the Name of the Product which will be searched; The method will be used in Management, in order to get the total stock for a Product which has been ordered; Also, we use this method to get the correct Price, along with computing the total amount the Client has to pay;

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct​(Product p, java.sql.Connection conn)
      This method updates the Product object after each Order which has been processed, the stock will decrease as soon as the Order is accepted;
      Parameters:
      p - : A variable representing a Product object;
      conn - : A variable representing the Connection with the SQL;
